text: nampikkaiyalarkalil ankal palar irukkinranar. Ivarkal allahvitam ceyta vakkurutiyai unmaiyakki vaittarkal. Avarkalil palar (irantu â€˜sahatat' ennum) tankal ilatciyattai ataintu vittanar. Veru cilar (maranikkavillai enralum atai ataiya avalutan) etirpartte irukkinranar. (Enna nerittalum avarkal tankal vakkurutiyiliruntu) oru ciritum marupattuvitave illai
